CustomField.description:
This field is used to show the Icons for Water Infra & Developer Services Field Workers Schedule List screen on mobile updated as part of sfs-7549
created by Vijay for POC of SAL-2809 Updated as a part of SFS-5426
CustomField.formula: IF(FSM_BusinessUnit__c = "Water Infra", IF(AND( CONTAINS(ServiceTerritory.Name, "WD4"), OR( ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority, "1"), ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Priority, "2") ) ), "üö®", "" ) & IF(FSM_ServiceOrderType__c = "ZPM3","‚ùóÔ∏è","") & IF(FSM_CustomerAppointment__c = True,"üè†" ,"") & IF(FSM_CheckTMA__c = True,"üö¶" ,"") & IF( NOT(IsBlank(FSM_ConstraintStart__c)) ,"üìÜ","") & IF( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_CustomerAtRiskofDissatisfaction__c = True ,"‚ö†Ô∏è","") & IF( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_VulnerableCustomer__c = True ,"ü§≤","") & IF( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_MeasuringPointCount__c > 0 ,"üìê","") ,"") & IF (FSM_BusinessUnit__c = "Developer Services", IF((DateTIMEValue(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_OpenDate__c + (FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.FSM_JobSLAInHours__c / 24)) - NOW())*24*60 <= 30 ,"üö©","") & IF(FSM_CheckTMA__c = True,"üö¶" ,"") ,"")
CustomField.label: Icon for Water Infra
